content.body: I'll get to it tonight and then put the label on
so i've never developed a TS project before, how do i actually build ecmarkup? it's complaining that it can't find ecmarkdown
oh i see, i guess i needed to `npm install`, but then how do i use a local copy of ecmarkdown?
content.formatted_body: oh i see, i guess i needed to npm install, but then how do i use a local copy of ecmarkdown?

content.body: the official way is to do `npm link` in your local ecmarkdown directory and then `npm link ecmarkdown` in your ecmarkup directory
content.formatted_body: the official way is to do npm link in your local ecmarkdown directory and then npm link ecmarkdown in your ecmarkup directory
